video.title: Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
video.synopsis: Agent Phil Coulson, seen in action in Marvel's The Avengers, assembles a team of top S.H.I.E.L.D. agents to investigate bizarre threats.

episodes.synopsis: To track an unknown enemy, agent Phil Coulson assembles a select group of agents from the worldwide law-enforcement organization known as S.H.I.E.L.D.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Coulson runs into Comandante Camilla Reyes when he and the agents travel to Peru to investigate a mysterious object.
When brilliant scientist Dr. Franklin Hall is kidnapped, Agent Coulson and his S.H.I.E.L.D. team must race against the clock to locate him.
episodes.title: The Asset

episodes.synopsis: Agent Coulson and the team track down a mysterious woman who has single-handedly committed numerous high-stakes heists.
episodes.title: Eye Spy

episodes.synopsis: Coulson and the team try to rescue a young man with an unusual and dangerous power. Skye has a secret that jeopardizes her relationship with the team.
episodes.title: Girl in the Flower Dress

episodes.synopsis: When floating bodies turn up, Coulson and the agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. must hunt down an elusive killer. No one is safe -- not even the team.
episodes.title: F.Z.Z.T

episodes.synopsis: Agent Coulson works the system to save Ward and Fitz when they're sent on a Level 8 classified mission.
episodes.title: The Hub

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of the events chronicled in the feature film Thor: The Dark World, Coulson and the S.H.I.E.L.D. team try to pick up the pieces.
episodes.title: The Well

episodes.synopsis: Coulson and his team are haunted by a mysterious force that threatens to destroy them all, and only a secret from May's past can save them.
episodes.title: Repairs

episodes.synopsis: In a shocking cliff-hanger, Coulson takes the war back to Centipede, and this time he brings in Mike Peterson for some supersoldier support.
episodes.title: The Bridge

episodes.synopsis: Coulson uncovers vital information about the mystery of his death, but with Centipede out for blood, the knowledge may come at a great cost.
episodes.title: The Magical Place

episodes.synopsis: Coulson and May uncover startling information about Skye's past, while the team is swept into a storm at S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy.
episodes.title: Seeds

episodes.synopsis: Hot on the trail of the Clairvoyant, Coulson and his team board a mystery train that seems headed for certain death.
episodes.title: T.R.A.C.K.S.

episodes.synopsis: On a quest to save Skye, Coulson enlists the aid of Ward's former supervising officer -- and uncovers shocking truths about himself and S.H.I.E.L.D.
episodes.title: T.A.H.I.T.I.

episodes.synopsis: When deadly seductress Lorelei attacks Coulson and his team, Thor's Lady Sif, Lorelei's longtime nemesis, steps in to try to save them.
episodes.title: Yes Men

episodes.synopsis: Agents Garrett and Triplett are back to help Coulson's team track down S.H.I.E.L.D.'s nefarious enemy -- the Clairvoyant.
episodes.title: End of the Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Coulson and his team find themselves without anyone they can trust, only to discover that they're trapped with a traitor in their midst.
episodes.title: Turn, Turn, Turn

episodes.synopsis: With Col. Glenn Talbot now on their trail, Coulson and his team take refuge and begin to uncover S.H.I.E.L.D.'s most dangerous secrets.
episodes.title: Providence

episodes.synopsis: When the life of Coulson's true love is threatened by Hydra, the team must undertake a perilous mission to save her.
episodes.title: The Only Light in the Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Agent Maria Hill returns to help Coulson as what's left of S.H.I.E.L.D. collapses due to the efforts of Hydra.
episodes.title: Nothing Personal

episodes.synopsis: While Ward recalls his first time meeting Garrett, Coulson and May infiltrate Cybertek and uncover details about Garrett’s past in Project Deathlok.
episodes.title: Ragtag

episodes.synopsis: With his team severely debilitated, Coulson pulls out all the stops to put an end to Garrett and the forces of Hydra.
episodes.title: Beginning of the End

episodes.synopsis: As Fitz's mental issues worsen, Coulson sends Skye and other S.H.I.E.L.D. agents to retrieve the Obelisk, a Hydra weapon stolen during World War II.
episodes.title: Shadows

episodes.synopsis: General Talbot captures Hunter, then offers him a deal to betray Coulson, while May pursues Creel, who has absorbed the Obelisk's deadly powers.
episodes.title: Heavy Is the Head

episodes.synopsis: Coulson and his team compete with Hydra to recruit Gill, a volatile gifted with cryokinetic skills, and the loyalty of Hydra mole Simmons is tested.
episodes.title: Making Friends and Influencing People

episodes.synopsis: Coulson and Talbot vie to acquire an ancient church painting with mysterious engravings, while Agent May pursues brainwashed Hydra spy Agent 33.
episodes.title: Face My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Raina sees Simmons contacting Coulson about the Obelisk, now controlled by "The Doctor," and threatens to expose her unless Coulson offers protection.
episodes.title: A Hen in the Wolf House

episodes.synopsis: S.H.I.E.L.D.'s future is in question after Hydra mercenaries impersonate them to attack the United Nations and Senator Ward orders an investigation.
episodes.title: A Fractured House

episodes.synopsis: When an unstable man starts murdering former S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and carving alien glyphs on them, Coulson seeks answers in Hydra's memory machine.
episodes.title: The Writing on the Wall

episodes.synopsis: To reclaim the Obelisk, Coulson and the team dig into Hydra's evil past, while Ward kidnaps his brother and confronts him about a childhood secret.
episodes.title: The Things We Bury

episodes.synopsis: Half of Coulson's team undertakes a frantic search for the alien city's entrance while the other half risks all to rescue Raina from Hydra's clutches.
episodes.title: Ye Who Enter Here

episodes.synopsis: Once inside, S.H.I.E.L.D. agents race to destroy the alien city before Hydra can lay claim to it. Skye uncovers a shocking secret about her past.
episodes.title: What They Become

episodes.synopsis: After Whitehall's death, Hydra vows revenge against Coulson, while Skye tries to cope with the aftereffects of her newfound earthquake abilities.
episodes.title: Aftershocks

episodes.synopsis: Coulson and team help Lady Sif, who lost her memory after fighting a mysterious warrior, while Bobbi and Mack plot their next secret moves.
episodes.title: Who You Really Are

episodes.synopsis: To destroy S.H.I.E.L.D., Cal gathers its enemies to form a team of supervillains. May asks her therapist ex-husband to help Skye control her gift.
episodes.title: One of Us

episodes.synopsis: With Ward's help, Agent 33 tries to undo Whitehall's alterations, while Bobbi and Mack reveal their allegiance to Hunter and the "real S.H.I.E.L.D."
episodes.title: Love in the Time of Hydra

episodes.synopsis: Coulson and the team confront Bobbi and Mack about their allegiances, and a still-struggling Skye gets advice from a strange but powerful source.
episodes.title: One Door Closes

episodes.synopsis: Loyalties are tested when Gonzales insists that the Fury toolbox be opened. Skye learns more about her powers from Inhuman transitioner Lincoln.
episodes.title: Afterlife

episodes.synopsis: Caught between S.H.I.E.LD. factions, May reflects on her troubled history with Coulson, and Skye makes a startling discovery about her heritage.
episodes.title: Melinda

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to infiltrate Hydra, Coulson and Hunter offer the captured Ward a deal, while Skye finds herself trapped between her warring parents.
episodes.title: Frenemy of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: With help from Bakshi, Coulson leads a team into the Hydra base. To save Lincoln, as foreseen by Raina, Gordon guides Skye back to S.H.I.E.L.D.
episodes.title: The Dirty Half Dozen

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to Coulson's world-saving helicarrier, the S.H.I.E.L.D. factions unite, but tensions between Skye's mother and Gonzales come to a brutal head.
episodes.title: Scars

episodes.synopsis: Jiaying convinces Skye and the Inhumans to fight against S.H.I.E.L.D., but Coulson sees through her deception and plots to save Skye and her father.
episodes.title: S.O.S.: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Led by Jiaying, the Inhumans attack the S.H.I.E.L.D. ship, intending to kill all humans, and Coulson's team must infiltrate the ship to stop them.
episodes.title: S.O.S.: Part 2
